resources.description:
**Request:**
- username: string
- password: string

**Response:**
  - username: string   
  - token: string   
  - role: "admin" | "student"

resources.name: Login

resources.description:
**Request:**
- startDate: Datestring  
  e.g. "01-24-2002"
- endDate: Datestring
- name: string
- description: string

**Response:**
- id: number  
  The id of the just created obligatoryUnit
resources.name: Create Obligatory Unit

resources.description:
Updates the obligatory unit of the id from the URL.  
**Request:**
- startDate: Datestring
- endDate: Datestring
- name: string
- description: string
- status: number  
  - 0 = invisible, only admins have access -> for newly created units
  - 1 = hidden, only admins have access -> for old untis
  - 2 = registerable, any student has access and can register for workshops
  - 3 = unregisterable, any stsudent has access but cannot register for workshops
  
**Response:**
- id: number
resources.name: Update Obligatory Unit

resources.description:
Returns all workshops that belong to an obligatory unit.

**Request:**  
The id in the url specifies the obligatory unit.

**Response:**  
- id: number  
  The id of the workshop
- name: string
- description: string
- startDate: Datestring
- duration: number  
  Duration of the workshop in days
- participants: number  
  Maximum amount of people that can register for that workshop
- currentParticipants: number  
  Amount of users that have currently registered for this workshop
resources.name: Get all Workshops

resources.description:
**Request:**  
status HTTP Query Parameter can be used to filter for only some status. If no parameter is present all status are returned.

**Response:**  
- id: number
- startDate: Datestring
- endDate: Datestring
- name: string
- description: string
- status: number  
  - 0 = invisible, only admins have access -> for newly created units
  - 1 = hidden, only admins have access -> for old untis
  - 2 = registerable, any student has access and can register for workshops
  - 3 = unregisterable, any stsudent has access but cannot register for workshops
resources.name: Get All Obligatory Units

resources.description:
**Request:**  
The id in the URL represents the id of the obligatory unit.

**Response:**  
- id: number
- startDate: Datestring
- endDate: Datestring
- name: string
- description: string
- status: number  
  - 0 = invisible, only admins have access -> for newly created units
  - 1 = hidden, only admins have access -> for old untis
  - 2 = registerable, any student has access and can register for workshops
  - 3 = unregisterable, any stsudent has access but cannot register for workshops
resources.name: Get Obligatory Unit

resources.description:
**Request:**  
The id in the URL represents the obligatory unit that should be deleted.

**Response:**  
Status 200 OK if deletion was successful.
resources.name: Delete Obligatory Unit

resources.description:
**Request:**  
The id in the URL represents the workshop that should be returned.

**Response:**  
- id: number  
  The id of the workshop
- name: string
- description: string
- startDate: Datestring
- duration: number  
  Duration of the workshop in days
- participants: number  
  Maximum amount of people that can register for that workshop
- currentParticipants: number  
  Array of users that are currently registered for the workshop
- registered: boolean  
  If user who sends the request is registered for this workshop
resources.name: Get Workshop

resources.description:
**Request:**  
- obligatoryUnit: number  
  The id of the obligatory unit the workshop belongs to
- name: string
- description: string
- startDate: Datestring
- duration: number  
  Duration of the workshop in days
- participants: number  
  Maximum amount of people that can register for that workshop
  
**Response:**
- id: number  
  The id of the newly created workshop
resources.name: Create Workshop

resources.description:
**Request:**  
- name: string
- description: string
- startDate: Datestring
- duration: number  
  Duration of the workshop in days
- participants: number  
  Maximum amount of people that can register for that workshop
  
**Response:**
- id: number
resources.name: Update Workshop

resources.description:
**Request:**  
The id in the URL represents the workshop that should be deleted

**Response:**  
HTTP Status 200 OK if successfully deleted
resources.name: Delete Workshop

resources.description:
**Request:**  
The id in the url represents the workshop that the currently logged in user tries to register 

**Response:**  
HTTP Status 200 OK if user has successfully registered
resources.name: Register

resources.description:
**Request:**  
The id in the url represents the workshop that the currently logged in user tries to unregister 

**Response:**  
HTTP Status 200 OK if user has successfully unregistered
resources.name: Unregister
